content.question: What is the capacitance of the capacitor when it is filled with the dielectric material?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator C sub 0, and denominator 4" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator C sub 0, and denominator 2" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
